name: Spontaneousstratification
tagline: NetLogo Model of Spontaneous Stratification, a natural process in granular mixtures and an example of emergent pattern formation. This is inspired by one of the video essays by George W. Hart for the Simons Foundation.
body:
SpontaneousStratification
=========================

NetLogo Model of Spontaneous Stratification, a natural process in granular mixtures and an example of emergent pattern formation. This is inspired by one of the video essays by George W. Hart for the Simons Foundation.>
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
